Package gamingthelan.server

Interface Summary
Interface Description
IConnectionCreator Generic creator connection interface
IListener Generic interface for ServerListener
IServer Generic server interface
 

Class Summary
Class Description
ConnectionCreator  
Server Allows you to create Server's object as a Singleton.
ServerConnection  
ServerListener Allows you to create ServerListener's object as a Singleton and creates a new Game with a new thread When the thread is created it check the port and create a new connection
